name: Shuffle Pre-Beta
description:
Shuffle is a game about shooting away at blobs with various cards, you can use these cards strategically, throwing them at precise spots to gain an advantage, or simply throwing away all of them and hoping for the best. 

You choose your play style. With a grand total of 5 levels, the Pre-Beta version of Shuffle is still under development, but I promise to keep it updated!

Don't forget to join our discord server!

-Moose
